item.title: Empty tree pit outside 74 Avondale Road with large toadstool, 2nd November
item.description:
Could the toadstool please be removed and could you please advise when a new tree will be planted in the empty tree pit outside No 74 Avondale Road. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avondale Road, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
